name: FrainBucked
description:
Controls :
- Use right and left arrow keys to move the player.

Gameplay Instructions:
- Avoid touching boxes of the player's boundary color.
- The player's boundary color changes after a few seconds.
- The box placed inside the player indicated the next boundary color.

Scoring:
- Player gets a point for collecting different color boxes
- Extra 5 points if the player collects a box of color same as color of the box inside the player.
